channel.title: Background made for apocraphy
channel.description:
what you guys think about this background i made
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/20kvm69.png[/img]
the empty space is for the login box and stuff.
if you want something like this add me on skype : dezixleader
yes i make them free :D

item.title: Background made for apocraphy
item.dc:creator: @Bullos Bullos
item.description:
@Bullos wrote:

Spark_:

The typography is nice but you need to work on the other stuff. The vectors your adds should be behind the text layer. It looks sloppy when it’s over the text. As for the background I think you should add snowy mountains and mess with the hue. Then add vectors to add a smoky blue mist. Then try to do something with the lighting.

evreything is behind it , the i made the text transparancy

Read full topic

item.title: Background made for apocraphy
item.dc:creator: @Spark1 Spark_
item.description:
@Spark1 wrote:

The typography is nice but you need to work on the other stuff. The vectors your adds should be behind the text layer. It looks sloppy when it’s over the text. As for the background I think you should add snowy mountains and mess with the hue. Then add vectors to add a smoky blue mist. Then try to do something with the lighting.

Read full topic

item.title: Background made for apocraphy
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Bullos, post:5, topic:529091”][quote author=b00mz1029 link=topic=647844.msg4357473#msg4357473 date=1377983624]

Atleast say it in a nicer way :rolleyes:

Good text! Try and work on the background to make it looks nicer!
[/quote]

actualy i didnt know what to do on the bacgkround , any suggestions?[/quote]
Im not very great at backgrounds but I’d try to make a rocky background that surrounds the text, making the text the center point. And i also think smoke would be appropriate.

Read full topic
